channel.title: iVinyl® on iVinyl
channel.description: Recent content in iVinyl® on iVinyl

item.title: Softways
item.description: Steven Pederson, Principal Developer Softways™ originated as a San Jose, California based developer and publisher of Macintosh software. Over the years it shifted to developing both Macintosh and Windows software released under the names of other companies. Finally, I headed for the beach: the Pacific Beach community of San Diego, California, where Softways™ remains today. Recently, the focus shifted to advanced mobile platforms and I fell in love with iOS as it powers the iPad, iPhone and iPod touch.

item.title: Support
item.description: Questions? Issues? Suggestions? Love? We’d love to hear from you at support@iVinylApp.com.
